Sentence: Leto and his (Leto) family, including his (Leto) concubine, Jessica, and his (Leto) son, Paul, suspect a trap by their rivals, the Harkonnens, led by Baron Harkonnen
Yueh, hands Duke Leto over to the baron, but in his (Leto) guilt he (Leto) helps Jessica and Paul escape
He (Paul) has a child with a Fremen woman, Chani, the daughter of Kynes, and his (Paul) mother has given birth to Alia, Duke Leto's daughter
